trans-unit.source: Represents the horizontal and vertical line segments that are dynamically created in the user interface (UI) to assist in the design-time layout of controls in a container.
trans-unit.target: Representa os segmentos de linha horizontal e vertical que são criados dinamicamente na interface de utilizador (IU) para ajudar o esquema de tempo de criação de controlos num contentor.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the common modes that visual design tools support to assist you with positioning and sizing controls on a design surface.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte lista os modos comuns que o suporte de ferramentas de estrutura visual para ajudá-lo com o posicionamento e controlos de uma superfície de desenho de dimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Description| |----------|-----------------| |Freeform|Enables you to freely lay out controls.| |Grid|Displays a static overlaid grid that assists you in laying out controls.| |Snapline|Displays guide lines that assist you in laying out the container's controls relative to each other.
trans-unit.target: | Modo | Descrição | |----------|-----------------| | Livres superior | Permite-lhe livremente dispor os controlos. | | Grelha | Apresenta uma grelha overlaid estática que ajuda a distribuir controlos. | | Snapline | Apresenta linhas guia que ajudá-lo a disposição dos controlos do contentor relativamente à entre si.

trans-unit.source: Snaplines originate from controls and their container.| The SnapLine class and related types help support the Snapline mode.
trans-unit.target: Snaplines provir de controlos e respetivo contentor. | A classe de SnapLine e tipos relacionados ajudam a suportar o modo de Snapline.

trans-unit.source: Snaplines are generated dynamically and automatically as a control edge moves near another control or near the boundaries of its container.
trans-unit.target: Snaplines são geradas dinamicamente e automaticamente como um controlo contorno move perto do outro controlo ou perto dos limites do respectivo contentor.

trans-unit.source: This can occur when a control is added from the toolbox, or moved or resized by mouse operations or keyboard commands.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode ocorrer quando um controlo é adicionado da caixa de ferramentas, ou movido ou redimensionado por operações de rato ou por comandos de teclado.

trans-unit.source: Controls typically have both horizontal and vertical snaplines defined; for rectangular controls, these typically extend from all four edges.
trans-unit.target: Controlos têm normalmente horizontal e vertical snaplines definida; para os controlos retangular, estas normalmente expandem de todas as extremidades de quatro.

trans-unit.source: The SnapLine class uses only a few properties to describe each snapline, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: A classe de SnapLine utiliza apenas algumas propriedades para descrevem cada snapline, conforme mostrado na seguinte tabela.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.SnapLineType%2A>|Specifies the location and direction of the line with respect to its associated control.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Descrição | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.SnapLineType%2A>| Especifica a localização e direção da linha no que respeita à respetiva controlo associado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.SnapLineType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, only snaplines of similar types will auto-align to each other.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Offset%2A>|Specifies the distance in pixels from the origin, which is the upper-left corner of the control, to where the snapline starts.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Priority%2A>|Specifies the relative importance of the snapline.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, apenas snaplines dos tipos semelhantes irão auto-alinhar entre si. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Offset%2A>| Especifica a distância, em pixels, da origem, que é o canto superior esquerdo do controlo, para onde inicia o snapline. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Priority%2A>| Especifica a importância relativa do snapline.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Priority%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Offset%2A>

trans-unit.source: During any given layout decision point, only the snaplines that are active and have the highest priority are displayed.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Filter%2A>|Defines custom categories of snaplines.
trans-unit.target: Durante a qualquer ponto de decisão de esquema fornecido, são apresentadas apenas os snaplines ativas e que tenham a prioridade mais alta. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Filter%2A>| Define as categorias personalizadas de snaplines.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Filter%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is an optional string.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.IsHorizontal%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.IsVertical%2A>|Indicates whether a snapline has horizontal or vertical orientation, respectively.| The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner> class stores snaplines for its corresponding control type in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.SnapLines%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esta é uma cadeia opcional. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.IsHorizontal%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.IsVertical%2A>| Indica se um snapline tem orientação horizontal ou vertical, respetivamente. | O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner>classe armazena snaplines para o respetivo tipo de controlo correspondente no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.SnapLines%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.SnapLines%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.IsVertical%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.IsHorizontal%2A>

trans-unit.source: This base class handling of snaplines will suffice for the majority of controls, as it defines the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType> snaplines, which are aligned along the edges of the control.
trans-unit.target: Este processamento de classe base da snaplines será suffice para a maioria dos controlos, que define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>snaplines, que estão alinhados ao longo de margens do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>

trans-unit.source: When you are developing a custom control, if this default organization does not suffice, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.SnapLines%2A> property of the class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Quando estiver a desenvolver um controlo personalizado, se esta organização predefinido não suffice, substitua a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.SnapLines%2A>propriedade da classe derivada de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.SnapLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you may want to align the horizontal snaplines of text-based controls, such as labels, with the top and base lines of the text (instead of the top and bottom edges of the control).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, poderá pretender alinhar a snaplines horizontal dos controlos baseado em texto, como etiquetas, com a parte superior e linhas de base do texto (em vez das margens superior e inferior do controlo).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.SnapLineType%2A> class cannot be derived from.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.SnapLineType%2A>classe não é possível derivar de.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.SnapLineType%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is extensive support for this feature in Visual Studio, see [Walkthrough: Arranging Controls on Windows Forms Using Snaplines](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte alargado para esta funcionalidade no Visual Studio, consulte [explicação passo a passo: Arranging controlos no Windows Forms utilizando Snaplines](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"></xref> class using the specified snapline type and offset.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"> </xref> com o tipo de snapline especificado e o desvio de classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Filter%2A> property to `null` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Priority%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLinePriority>.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Filter%2A>propriedade `null` e a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Priority%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLinePriority>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLinePriority> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Priority%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Filter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType"></xref> to create.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType"> </xref> criar.

trans-unit.source: Describes the relative position and orientation of the snapline.
trans-unit.target: Descreve a posição relativa e a orientação do snapline.

trans-unit.source: The position of the snapline, in pixels, relative to the upper-left origin of the owning control.
trans-unit.target: A posição do snapline, em pixels, relativos à origem de canto superior esquerdo do controlo proprietário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"></xref> class using the specified snapline type, offset, and filter name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"> </xref> classe utilizando o tipo de snapline especificado, o desvio e o nome do filtro.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Priority%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLinePriority>.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor define a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Priority%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLinePriority>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLinePriority> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Priority%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType"></xref> to create.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType"> </xref> criar.

trans-unit.source: Describes the relative position and orientation of the snapline.
trans-unit.target: Descreve a posição relativa e a orientação do snapline.

trans-unit.source: The position of the snapline, in pixels, relative to the upper-left origin of the owning control.
trans-unit.target: A posição do snapline, em pixels, relativos à origem de canto superior esquerdo do controlo proprietário.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> used to specify a programmer-defined category of snaplines.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>utilizada para especificar uma categoria definido pelo programador de snaplines.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"></xref> class using the specified snapline type, offset, and priority.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"> </xref> utilizando o tipo de snapline especificado, o deslocamento e a prioridade de classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Filter%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Filter%2A>propriedade `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Filter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType"></xref> to create.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType"> </xref> criar.

trans-unit.source: Describes the relative position and orientation of the snapline.
trans-unit.target: Descreve a posição relativa e a orientação do snapline.

trans-unit.source: The position of the snapline, in pixels, relative to the upper-left origin of the owning control.
trans-unit.target: A posição do snapline, em pixels, relativos à origem de canto superior esquerdo do controlo proprietário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLinePriority"></xref> of the snapline.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLinePriority"> </xref> do snapline.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"></xref> class using the specified snapline type, offset, filter name, and priority.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"> </xref> classe com o tipo especificado snapline, deslocamento, nome do filtro e prioridade.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets all of the properties of a snapline to programmer-supplied values.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor define todas as propriedades de um snapline para valores fornecido pelo programador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType"></xref> to create.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType"> </xref> criar.

trans-unit.source: Describes the relative position and orientation of the snapline.
trans-unit.target: Descreve a posição relativa e a orientação do snapline.

trans-unit.source: The position of the snapline, in pixels, relative to the upper-left origin of the owning control.
trans-unit.target: A posição do snapline, em pixels, relativos à origem de canto superior esquerdo do controlo proprietário.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> used to specify a programmer-defined category of snaplines.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>utilizada para especificar uma categoria definido pelo programador de snaplines.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLinePriority"></xref> of the snapline.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLinePriority"> </xref> do snapline.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Offset*> property of the snapline.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Offset*>propriedade o snapline.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.Offset*>

trans-unit.source: The offset of a snapline is the distance, in pixels, that the snapline is located from the associated control's upper-left origin.
trans-unit.target: O desvio de um snapline é a distância, em pixels, que o snapline encontra-se da origem de canto superior esquerdo do controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: Although the offset can be set to any integer value, typically the snaplines retain the spatial relationships implied by their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.SnapLineType%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Embora o deslocamento pode ser definido como qualquer valor de número inteiro, normalmente as snaplines manter as relações geográficos implicadas pelo respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.SnapLineType%2A>valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.SnapLineType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels to change the snapline offset by.
trans-unit.target: O número de pixels para alterar o deslocamento de snapline pelo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the programmer-defined filter category associated with this snapline.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a categoria de filtro definido pelo programador associada a este snapline.

trans-unit.source: The Filter property is used to define custom categories of snaplines.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de filtro é utilizada para definir categorias personalizadas de snaplines.

trans-unit.source: Only snaplines with the same filter name are able to snap to each other.
trans-unit.target: Apenas snaplines com o mesmo nome de filtro são capazes de snap entre si.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used in custom control designers to expose different categories of snaplines depending upon the state of the control or the type of operation being performed.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade pode ser utilizada no designers de controlo personalizado para expor os diferentes categorias de snaplines consoante o estado do controlo ou o tipo de operação a ser efetuada.

trans-unit.source: For example, round controls could offer a custom snapline with the filter value of "Center".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, os controlos arredondar foi oferecem um snapline personalizada com o valor do filtro de "Center".

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized during construction and cannot be changed thereafter.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é inicializada durante a construção e não pode ser alterada após essa data.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that defines the filter category.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que define a categoria de filtro.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the snapline has a horizontal orientation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o snapline tem uma orientação horizontal.

trans-unit.source: The following snapline types are horizontal: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>.
trans-unit.target: Os seguintes tipos de snapline são horizontais: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the snapline is horizontal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o snapline é horizontal; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the snapline has a vertical orientation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o snapline tem uma orientação vertical.

trans-unit.source: The following snapline types are vertical: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>.
trans-unit.target: Os seguintes tipos de snapline são verticais: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the snapline is vertical; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o snapline é vertical; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of pixels that the snapline is offset from the origin of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de pixels que o snapline é deslocamento da origem do controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The origin of a control is the upper-left point of the control.
trans-unit.target: A origem de um controlo é o ponto do canto superior esquerdo do controlo.

trans-unit.source: A single offset can describe the position of a snapline, because vertical snaplines may have only a nonzero x-axis offset, whereas horizontal snaplines may only have a nonzero y-axis offset.
trans-unit.target: Um desvio único pode descrever a posição de um snapline porque vertical snaplines pode ter apenas um deslocamento do eixo x diferentes de zero, enquanto que horizontal snaplines só pode ter um eixo y diferente de zero desvio.

trans-unit.source: The Offset property is initialized at construction time, but it can be changed thereafter with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.AdjustOffset%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de desvio é inicializada durante a construção, mas podem ser alterado depois com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.AdjustOffset%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine.AdjustOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: The offset, in pixels, of the snapline.
trans-unit.target: O desvio em pixels, do snapline.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the relative importance of the snapline.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica a importância relativa do snapline.

trans-unit.source: The Priority property establishes categories of importance for the snaplines associated with a control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de prioridade estabelece categorias de importância para snaplines associada a um controlo.

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms Designer uses this property to determine which snaplines to display during a control addition, resize, or move operation.
trans-unit.target: O estruturador de formulários do Windows utiliza esta propriedade para determinar quais snaplines para apresentar durante a adição de controlo, redimensionar ou de operação de transferência.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLinePriority> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLinePriority>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLinePriority>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized during construction and cannot be changed thereafter.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é inicializada durante a construção e não pode ser alterada após essa data.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLinePriority"></xref> that represents the priority category of a snapline.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLinePriority"> </xref> que representa a categoria de prioridade de um snapline.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"></xref> should snap to another <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"> </xref> deve snap para outro <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"></xref> to which the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"></xref> is expected to snap.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"> </xref> ao qual especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"> </xref> deverá snap.

trans-unit.source: if line1 should snap to line2; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if line1 should snap to line2; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of a snapline, which indicates the general location and orientation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de um snapline, que indica a localização geral e orientação.

trans-unit.source: Visual designers use the SnapLineType property to direct snap alignment operations.
trans-unit.target: Visual designers utilizem a propriedade de SnapLineType direcionar snap alinhamento operações.

trans-unit.source: Typically only snaplines that are similarly oriented can snap to each other.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, apenas snaplines são da mesma forma orientado por pode snap entre si.

trans-unit.source: For example, two snaplines of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType> can snap together, but a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType> and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType> snapline cannot.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, dois snaplines do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>pode snap em conjunto, mas um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>snapline não é possível.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized during construction and cannot be changed thereafter.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é inicializada durante a construção e não pode ser alterada após essa data.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType"></xref> that represents the orientation and general location, relative to control edges, of a snapline.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLineType"> </xref> que representa a orientação e a localização geral, relativo à margens do controlo, de um snapline.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the current snapline.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma representação de cadeia do snapline atual.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a string that contains details about the type, offset, priority, and filter values of the snapline.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve uma cadeia que contém detalhes sobre o tipo, deslocamento, prioridade e valores de filtro do snapline.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que representa o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>
